page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: A large Secondary High School serves this area and others, offering a range of C.S.E. & G.C.E. courses and is also an Evening Centre for many activities. Attached, is a Youth Wing which caters for the 9_16 group in post School hours, offering swimming, computer club, karate, table tennis, pool, etc. on payment of a small fee. An Infant School operates from an 1870 building and currently houses 180 5_7 yr.olds; this feeds a Junior School built 1969 with 240 mixed 7_11 yr.olds. In South Willesborough is a J.M.I. 5_11 School recently built to replace an earlier building. South is Kingsnorth School C.ofE. which has mixed 5_11 yr.olds. The Council operate a training centre for the severely sub_normal, of whom some are housed in a special unit.
